text: Jesus the Worker, Vitoria, is a polytechnic institute founded by Demetrio Ruiz de Alburuza in 1945. In 2012 it became the main component of the diocesan EGIBIDE network of schools. It has played a significant role in the social and industrial development of Álava. ==References== Category:Catholic schools in Spain Category:Jesuit secondary schools Category:Secondary schools in Spain Category:Jesuit secondary schools in Spain Category:Educational institutions established in 1942 Category:1942 establishments in Spain
title: Jesus the Worker, Vitoria
